info.title: Rekaz Simple Drive API
info.description: A simple object storage system providing a single interface for multiple storage backends including S3 Compatible Storage, Database, Local File System, and FTP.

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token
Logout the authenticated user and revoke their access token

get.description: Get a paginated list of blobs with optional filtering

post.description: Store a new blob using one of two methods: 1) JSON format with Base64 encoded data (application/json), or 2) File upload with multipart form data (multipart/form-data). Switch between content types in the request body section below.

schema.description: Method 1: JSON format - Send blob data as Base64 encoded string

id.description: Unique identifier for the blob. Can be UUID, path, or any valid string

data.description: Base64 encoded binary data. Must be valid Base64 format and non-empty after decoding

schema.description: Method 2: File upload - Upload binary files directly

storage_backend.description: Optional storage backend (database, local, s3, ftp)

400.description: Validation error - Invalid Base64 data or missing required fields

message.example: The data field must be valid Base64 encoded data.

items.example: The data field must be valid Base64 encoded data.

get.description: Retrieve blob content or metadata by ID
